title: Why Does Toothpaste Make Orange Juice Taste Bad?
itunes:title: Why Does Toothpaste Make Orange Juice Taste Bad?
description:
Why does toothpaste make orange juice taste bad? Chuck recounts his first-hand experience, and how it works.
